meanings.definition: Excessive consumption of goods or resources beyond what is necessary or sustainable.
meanings.sent1: The overconsumptions of food at the party led to a lot of waste.
meanings.sent2: Her overconsumptions of water during the hike left her feeling sick.
meanings.sent3: The overconsumptions of candy made the children hyperactive.
meanings.sent4: The overconsumptions of electricity drained the household budget.
meanings.sent5: The overconsumptions of paper towels in the restroom were unnecessary and harmful to the environment.

meanings.definition: The act of consuming more than is needed or recommended.
meanings.sent1: His overconsumptions of snacks between meals affected his appetite for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The overconsumptions of sugary drinks contributed to her weight gain.
meanings.sent3: The overconsumptions of TV shows kept him up late at night.
meanings.sent4: Her overconsumptions of compliments made her friends suspicious of her motives.
meanings.sent5: The overconsumptions of office supplies by the interns caused a shortage for the rest of the staff.
